properties.areaDesc: Wasatch Plateau/Book Cliffs; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Western Uinta Mountains; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 4 at 2:31PM MST until February 7 at 4:00PM MST by NWS Salt Lake City UT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 20
inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph.

* WHERE...Wasatch Mountains I-80 North, Wasatch Mountains South
of I-80, Western Uinta Mountains and Wasatch Plateau/Book
Cliffs.

* WHEN...From midnight Wednesday night to 4 PM MST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Strong gusty winds may
cause areas of blowing snow.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including
Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit
weather.gov/slc/winter.

For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of
Transportation, visit
http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial
511.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT WEDNESDAY NIGHT TO 4 PM MST FRIDAY
